item.title: Sad Puppies at the Hugo Awards: What their failure tells us about Donald Trump. http://www.slate.com/blogs/xx_factor/2015/08/24/sad_puppies_at_the_hugo_awards_what_their_failure_tells_us_about_donald.html "They've seen the world they knew and loved crumble under their
item.author: Theo Jones
item.description:
Sad Puppies at the Hugo Awards: What their failure tells us about Donald Trump.
http://www.slate.com/blogs/xx_factor/2015/08/24/sad_puppies_at_the_hugo_awards_what_their_failure_tells_us_about_donald.html
"They've seen the world they knew and loved crumble under their feet, undone by diversity, feminism, and 'political correctness.' Over the weekend, they tried to hold an event intended to celebrate the populist everyman."
